name: get bearer
info:
Get a new bearer and refresh token and stores it in global variables. 

The global variables system_bearerMiele and system_refreshMiele are being used.

name: get all appliances
info:
Get a list of all appliances with indentification and state.

Prereq: bearer in global variable system_bearerMiele

name: get appliance
info:
Get an object with identification and state data for the given appliance id.

Prereq: bearer in global variable system_bearerMiele

name: get actions
info:
Get an object with all valid actions for the given appliance id at the current appliance state.

Prereq: bearer in global variable system_bearerMiele

name: set action
info: Set (execute) an action for the given appliance. Valid action depend on kind of appliance and state!
inputLabels: appliance id in payload and an action

name: no ip but correct serial number

Objective of this tab - Documentation
info:
# Introduction
Often errors occures because objects or part of objects are not initialized or hold invalid values. This causes errors in following flows. 

# Solution
The path of every property is being intensively checked: **undefined, null, empty string** and not value "**NaN**".

NaN is a strange one. It can be exclued by testing "msg.payload !== msg.payload" or by testing "(typeof msg.payload === 'number' && isNaN(msg.payload))"

The second one is longer but more obsious. 

In case of msg.propLevel1.propLevel2 I do test all elements except msg. Msg is given and can not be null or undefined.

name: payload NaN
func:
msg.payload = parseInt('Hallo');  // provides NaN
return msg;

name: Function isOnOff: set crossfade, set.mutestate, set.nightmode, set.dialoglevel
Function string2ValidInteger - remove track, play track, set subgain, set volume, adjust volume
dialog input state overrides msg (required string) - what is tested
info:
1. Command play http stream: string requried

**SONOS payload string, blank**

"b5" should play b5 as payload in node is empty string (ignored) but msg.payload provides valid stream

"payload blank" should cause an error as payload in node is empty string (ignored) and inject does not provide a valid payload.

**SONOS payload string, xxx**
both should throw error as xxxx is not a valid stream - error 714!


**SONOS payload number empty**

"b5" should play b5 as payload in node is empty number(ignored) but msg.payload provides valid stream

"payload blank" should cause an error as payload in node is empty number (ignored) and inject does not provide a valid payload.


**SONOS payload number 5**
Both should provide error as number is not allowed in this case
